short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect pictures, screenshot, text, and URL from internet to Fabrie with simply drag or click
short.zh_CN: 通过直观的拖拽和点击从互联网采集图片、屏幕截图、文本和 URL到Fabrie素材中转站

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
V1.1 functions: 
- Now support collecting text and URL 
- New intuitive interactions (drag and drop, Ctrl+right click) 
- Customized shortcut to screenshot or save web page
long.zh_CN:
V1.1功能：
- 现支持文本和URL的采集
- 直观的采集交互（拖放、Ctrl+右键单击）
- 自定义截图和保存网页的快捷键
